reviews.text:
Jesse and his Team were great to work with. After interviewing 6 pool companies he fought hard for our business and after that he fought hard for us to be happy. From fluctuations in what we wanted to last minute changes (not recommending but that’s what happened) to supply chain complications it was really nice to work with Jesse.
Even during peak season for his work he kept in constant communication with us and made sure we were happy with the work.
When we had questions or doubted something h

I had a pool that had been empty for over six months due to a loss of electricity from a house fire. I was worried about the cracks, pool floating, and potential leaks. I reached out to Ray and Jesse, who were very knowledgeable about getting the pool back into shape. Jesse was very communicative through replastering, redoing all the coping, new tiling, and fixing all the cracks. Jesse also worked with me on the price as we had other expenses on the home that we needed to cover. His team was fas

Working with DFW Outdoor Design & Construction was an absolute pleasure. Jesus and his team were not only skilled and knowledgeable but also incredibly personable. They handled my outdoor design project with great care and attention to detail, making sure every aspect was perfect. The staff's friendliness and dedication were evident throughout the process, and I couldn't be happier with the final result. I will definitely be sharing their contact information with friends and family!

I had an outstanding experience with DFW Outdoor Design & Construction for my recent swimming pool project. Jesse and his team were true professionals, and their work ethic was commendable. They were prompt, efficient, and the end results were truly remarkable. I highly recommend their services to anyone in Dallas looking for exceptional outdoor design work. You won't be disappointed! I'll be sure to hire them again for any future projects.

My very old pool had greenish black water. I didn’t know who to contact & was referred to Jessee at DFW Outdoor Design. He came out quickly & was straightforward & honest in his approach. He provided a written estimate for draining & cleaning at a reasonable price. If you have a pool that has gotten out of control, don’t be afraid to call him!!  I highly recommend Jessee & his crew!

DFW Outdoor Design & Construction delivered an excellent experience with their top-notch service and friendly staff. Jesus and his team were quick and professional, completing my diving board project to perfection. I appreciated their transparency in pricing and their clear communication. If you have any outdoor design needs, don't hesitate to contact DFW Outdoor Design & Construction. They are the best choice for reliable and skilled service!

I had a fantastic experience working with DFW Outdoor Design & Construction on my backyard patio project. Jesus and his team were highly skilled and efficient, transforming my outdoor space into a beautiful and functional area. The crew was punctual and kept the site clean throughout the construction process. Jesus was communicative and receptive to my ideas, ensuring that the final design met all my expectations. The end result was simply stunning, and I can't wait to host gatherings in my newl

I met with Jesse a few weeks ago to get a quote on a pool remodel. After meeting with several other contractors, I knew immediately DFW Outdoor Design & Construction would do my project. Jesse made me feel comfortable and confident they could get the job done.... and they did. On time and as promised. I highly recommend DFW Outdoor Design & Construction. Honest, reliable, and hardworking.

I previously wrote a 3 star review, encouraged by the owner of the company in order to discount the total construction. It’s been 1.5 years since our install and when trying to reach out about some busted grout/tile to fix under our warranty, it seems this company has gone out of business and won’t be keeping their contractural agreements with clients. Jesse’s phone number is shut down and no way to contact to get our pool fixed under warranty.
Designed and built the outdoor add on to our home. Very professional and amazing job! We can’t wait to spend all of our time outside now. Thank you!!!
Jesse and his team did great work on our railing. He was extremely responsive and communicative thoughout the process, and his price was fair. Would hire again
Jesus and his team were super professional and quick to get our diving board project done! He was very communicative and provided transparent pricing. Contact him for all your outdoor design needs!

Jesus and team came out to my house to fix the pool coping and did a great job. It wasn't a big fix but they still came out and took care it fast and professionally. Would definitely recommend them and use them again.
Jesse and team were great from beginning to end. Work was done efficiently and results were outstanding!
Awesome customer service! Jesse was very professional! Project was completed on time!
Great company to work with, due to the weather it took a bit longer than expected but the end result was spectacular.
The staff here is awesome. They have a friendly staff that's makes you feel like a part of the family
Great company to work with, very knowledgeable and great people all around.
Friendly, Fast, and reliable great services would recommend for future jobs work
True to there work and stands by there word. Awesome group of people working for this company
Will highly recommend to friends and family, spectacular work very friendly staff
Quality, Professionalism, Value
